pr_title: IGNITE-13431 Fix NPE when PRIMITIVE strategy is used with BLOB value.

timeline.message: IGNITE-13431 Fix NPE when PRIMITIVE strategy is used with BLOB value.

timeline.bodyText: Why are you drop ArrayList initial size to default one?
timeline.author: AMashenkov

replies.bodyText: This list is only created once per cache initialization, and is expected to have small size (<1000 entries), making initial size specification superfluous in my opinion. Do you have any specific reason why this exact ArrayList needs initial size?
replies.author: alamar
